subsection_analysis.refined_text: Fill in interactive forms An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in .
select anywhere in the form to access options, such as radio buttons . select inside a text field to type .

Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons . you can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form using the Fill & Sign tool if required .
use the formatting options as desired.
Advanced Authoring can be enabled by selecting the toggle in the upper right corner .
